profileDescription: I have been working in the field of front-end development more than 3 years. During this period I’ve gained experience in building: web and native (ios, android) applications; backend servers for commercial projects. I achieved great results in front-end and full-stack developing using: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Node, TypeScript, React, React Native, GraphQL, Redux, Jest, Enzyme, Docker and other. Also in my work I used OOP concepts, SOLID, DRY, KISS. I want to work as JS developer (React, React Native, TypeScript, Node) at a progressive company on interesting projects where I can grow as programmer and bring maximum benefits to the company.

education.training: Bachelor Degree at Financial Analytics and Engineering in Bank
MERN stack (Mongo, Express, React, Node) Course

experience.duties: Dueties: take part at development and support of company’s products as full stack web developer (React, Node, TypeScript) in the field of medicine.
